Text:
mille grazie per tutto. 

however, this is one of the most dissapointing episodes of my life. Hope marries the fool Liam. 
on a 2nd thought thats good for Stephie too.

yes, I have to say I am really bored with the show, all it's been is the Hope & Liam show now or 2 solid months, ENOUGH Already, I don't like Hope anyway and it just makes it easier to turn o B&B, glad Y&R is moving right along : )

Thanks for the episode MsFenmore!
@swangpo & nicollette ... TEAM STEFFY! And Liam is a gutless wonder! LOL Cheers!
